scripts.cypress:run: npm run prereport && npx cypress run
scripts.cypress:e2e: npm run cypress:run; npm run junit:merge;  npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cy:run_spec: npm run prereport && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/SC/login.sc.spec.js' --headless --record --key 10be2298-25ea-4ecf-97c8-0a0cbe4eafc3
scripts.cy:run_parallel: npm run cy:run_chrome & npm run cy:run_edge
scripts.cy:run_p: npm run cy:run2 & npm run cy:run2
